channel.title: Exilion 742 | Grand Exchange | Team Dungeon | Summoning | Duel Arena | Boss raid
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://"http://www.exilionps.com"][IMG]http://www.exilionps.com/images/dzt/logo.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.exilionps.com"]Homepage[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.exilionps.com/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.exilionps.com/Exilion.jar"]Download Client[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/center]
[center][SIZE=3]Pictures:[/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://www.exilionps.com"][IMG]http://www.exilionps.com/images/dzt/Exilionadvertisingpicture.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]Features:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]- All Skills
- Flawless Construction
- Pest Control
- Duel Arena
- Castle Wars
- Clan Chats
- Quests
- Grand Exchange
- Fight Caves/Kiln
- Money Pouch
- Economy Server
- PvP/PvE/Skilling
- Automatic Server Events
- Large world to explore
- Penguin Hide and Seek
- Sink Holes
- Evil Trees
- Boss raids
- Shooting Stars
- Interactive enviroments such as desert heat, freezing snow, smoke in dungeons, etc.
- Fully working clans, customization, symbols, etc.
- Player based grand exchange with history, set exchanging, etc.
- Friends chat working with loot and coin share.
- Fully working gravestones with death interfaces, chosing of gravestones, etc.
- Near to all sorts of transportation (boats, minecarts, fairy rings, gliders, spirit trees, jewlery, etc)
- Over 50 accessible monster loctions, dungeons, etc. all completed with objects and npcs.
- Full character customization with saving along with makeover mage, hair salon, etc.
- Squeal of Fortune handling the different types of spins, daily spins, sending to bank, claiming later, etc.
- Account security such as full bank pins with recovering pins, etc.
- Money pouch implementation to everything including shops, dialogues, ground objects, etc.
- Global npc and item spawns, nearly all of them.
- Complete and fully working clue scrolls from easy to elite.
- Trivia Bot
- Achievement announcer
- Proper Dwarf Cannon
- RS-Like teleport ways to walk arround the server
- Godwars Dungeon
- Metal Dragons
- Resource Dungeons
- Amazing Summoning (with charms)
- Friendly Interfaces
- Nice PvP/PvE System
- Fast Support
- Squeal of Fortune
- Protect Item System
- Real RS Experience
- Friendly Community
- Active Updates [/SIZE]
